name: set_offset
example_comment: The above snippet moves the <%= doc_class_name %>100 pixels to the right, and 50 pixels down, from the center of the <%= type 'Tile' %>.
description: Changes the offset of this <%= doc_class_name %> from the center of the <%= type 'Tile' %> they're standing on.
**Positive** X values move it to the *right*, **negative** X values move it to the *left*.
**Positive** Y values move it *downwards*, **negative** Y values move it *upwards*.

parameters.name: X
parameters.desc: The horizontal offset of this <%= doc_class_name %>.

parameters.name: Y
parameters.desc: The vertical offset of this <%= doc_class_name %>.
